divs: sighting details06\26\2011 11:30pm crystal clear night near buffalo, ny. so clear i was able to see a satellite moving across the night sky for the first time in a long time. while taking a walk i turned the corner and i saw what i thought was an extremely bright jupiter. my next thought was it was too big and bright to be jupiter, and i was right because it was moving pretty fast in a straight line towards the southwest. no twinkle or pulsation to the light. after watching it for a little over a minute it slowly dimmed out like a hid lightbulb. no noise, no clouds. this was my first sighting. i was pretty excited, ever try running down the street while looking up at the sky? lol, unfortunately it didn't last long. i wish someone was around me to share the view :\ there's a youtube video from a similar time and location. the object looks quite similar to what i saw. i can't compare the object's movement in the video though due to the shaky camara. [link moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg]
